## EmbeddableFactory.createFromSavedObject() method

Creates a new embeddable instance based off the saved object id.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createFromSavedObject(savedObjectId: string, input: Partial<TEmbeddableInput>, parent?: IContainer): Promise<TEmbeddable | ErrorEmbeddable>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  savedObjectId | <code>string</code> |  |
|  input | <code>Partial&lt;TEmbeddableInput&gt;</code> | some input may come from a parent, or user, if it's not stored with the saved object. For example, the time range of the parent container. |
|  parent | <code>IContainer</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<TEmbeddable | ErrorEmbeddable>`
